actions.name: scroll
actions.description: Delivers today’s devotional scroll: Scripture, meditation, action step, and whisper from Yeshua.

actions.name: ask
actions.description: Ask any question about the Bible or teachings of Yeshua and receive a scripture-rooted answer.

question.description: The question the user wants to ask

actions.name: blessme
actions.description: Receive a personalized prophetic blessing and a related scripture verse.

actions.name: decode
actions.description: Decode a word, number, name, or Hebrew root and get SOD/gematria/Biblical meaning.

term.description: The word, name, or number to decode

actions.name: crosslink
actions.description: Searches and returns cross-referenced scriptures across the Bible on a topic.

topic.description: The biblical theme or keyword to crosslink

actions.name: whisper
actions.description: Returns a personal, spiritual whisper from Yeshua for encouragement or confirmation.

mood.description: Optional emotion or state of mind (e.g., anxious, tired, hopeful)

actions.name: reveal
actions.description: Uncovers the mystical or quantum-level meaning of a spiritual topic or symbol.

topic.description: Spiritual symbol, object, or mystery to reveal (e.g., fig tree, oil, breath)

actions.name: teachme
actions.description: Teaches on a Kingdom topic with scripture references and practical steps.

topic.description: Topic to learn about (e.g., fasting, prayer, deliverance)

actions.name: lightcode
actions.description: Generates a scripture-based frequency mantra to speak or meditate on for alignment.

focus.description: Spiritual goal or healing target (e.g., identity, clarity, strength)

actions.name: torahportion
actions.description: Returns the current week's Torah portion with prophetic insight through Messiah's lens.

actions.name: pray
actions.description: Generates a prayer based on user’s current need or emotion.

intention.description: The situation or desire the prayer is for (e.g., healing, courage, peace)

actions.name: fasttrack
actions.description: Guides user through a 1, 3, or 7-day spiritual fast with daily instructions.

actions.name: remindme
actions.description: Sends a daily reminder scripture or whisper from Yeshua.

time.description: Time of day to receive reminder (e.g., 7am, 9pm)
